casebody.data:
PEOPLE
v.
LOPEZ S239567 Supreme Court of California. JUNE 27, 2018 Votes: Cantil-Sakauye, C.J., Chin, Corrigan, Liu, Cuéllar and Kruger, JJ.

The matter is transferred to the Court of Appeal, Second Appellate District, Division 6 with directions to vacate its decision and reconsider the cause in light of the 2017 amendment to Health & Safety Code section 11370.2 (Stats. 2017, ch. 677, § 1, eff. Jan. 1, 2018 (S.B. 180) ) and In re Estrada (1965) 63 Cal.2d 740, 48 Cal.Rptr. 172, 408 P.2d 948. ( Cal. Rules of Court, rule 8.528(d).)
